In England, in the seven days to 13 November, there were 217,673 new confirmed cases (384.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 November, there were 196,178 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% (21,495 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 November is 8,244,111 (14,578.4 cases per 100,000 population).
